comments.comment: Faded so much in the wash! Was a red, now it's pink!
Wasn't exactly what I had hoped for!
Bought matching ones for me and my twin! My parents loved it!
I was very happy with my sweater! Turned out exactly how I wanted it to!
Didn't fit even though I ordered my regular size! But still a high quality product!
Bought this as a present for my sister! Her and my mom loved it!
Product is great! Took 2 months to get here! Ridiculous!
Awful product! Shrunk 3 sizes in the wash!
